content: knit this beautifully textured cowl using only one skein of worsted weight yarn and the gorgeous dot stitch this cowl works up quickly and would make wonderful gifts for yourself or loved ones this is a great stash-busting project since it uses only one skein of yarn the free knit pattern can be found *** here 1 *** if you have a different weight of yarn you would like to use check out the ** bulky dotty cowl here 2 ** level 5 bulky yarn and the ** chunky dotty cowl here 3 ** level 6 super bulky yarn you can also find my ** dotty beanie pattern 4 ** using worsted weight yarn ** here 5 ** note that the pdf for purchase contains **all the dotty cowl patterns** for worsted weight bulky and super bulky yarns 1 https //www allaboutami com/dotty-cowl/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/bulky-dotty-cowl/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/chunky-dotty-cowl/ 4 https //www allaboutami com/the-dotty-beanie-knit-pattern/ 5 https //www allaboutami com/the-dotty-beanie-knit-pattern/
